document.description: Total receipts and balance against sales, deposit ... Australia (Melbourne) -> Fast Food Restaurant Manager ... Collect and distribute the knowledge within the team ...
document.body:
Print Topic - Archive Click here to return to the original view. Save to Disk. Hellenism.Net - Greek Forum / General Discussion / International Job Opportunities for Greek Speakers Posted by: Grecruitment.com, August 31, 2009, 5:02am Dear Hellenism Friends,
First of all I want to thank the Hellenism.net Team for let me open this thread and let you know about international job opportunities for greek speakers.
